meanings.definition: Not in or to any place; not anywhere.
meanings.sent1: She looked nowheres in the room for her lost keys.
meanings.sent2: I searched nowheres for my missing sock.
meanings.sent3: The cat's toy seemed to disappear nowheres when I turned my back.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts wandered nowheres as he stared out the window.
meanings.sent5: The ghostly figure vanished nowheres into the mist.

meanings.definition: In no way; not at all.
meanings.sent1: I am nowheres tired after that short walk.
meanings.sent2: He is nowheres interested in joining the club.
meanings.sent3: The idea of eating bugs is nowheres appealing to me.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice is nowheres similar to her speaking voice.
meanings.sent5: The old car is nowheres as fast as the new one.
